title: Create a Secret
description: Create a Secret named ||db-secret|| with username ||'admin'|| and password ||'secret123'|| in the ||saturn|| namespace.

steps: kubectl create secret generic db-secret --from-literal=username=admin --from-literal=password=secret123 -n saturn
kubectl get secret db-secret -n saturn -o yaml

validations.description: Secret should exist in saturn namespace

validations.command: kubectl get secret db-secret -n saturn -o jsonpath='{.data.username}' | base64 -d
kubectl get secret db-secret -n saturn -o jsonpath='{.data.password}' | base64 -d
